title: FC Altai Semey
text:
Football Club Altai () is a <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakh</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Semey">Semey</a>. They play in the <a href="Kazakhstan%20First%20Division">Kazakhstan First Division</a>, the second level of <a href="Football%20in%20Kazakhstan">Kazakh football</a>.
History.
The club was founded in January 2016 from the merger of two clubs, <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Semey">Spartak Semey</a> and <a href="FC%20Vostok">Vostok</a>. It is a professional team and plays in the First Division.
